name: Cloaker
movement: 10 feet on the ground and 40 feet flying
description: The Cloaker resembles a large, dark manta ray with long, whip-like tails, often lurking in shadows or hanging from ceilings.
memorable: Cloakers can blend into their surroundings, disguise as a cloak, and use chilling moans to frighten prey.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting adventurers in dark caverns and ruins, often working with other dark creatures.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dark-dwelling creatures, often relying on ambush tactics.
environment: Typically found in caverns and ruins, especially in dark or shadowy areas.
strengths: Highly intelligent with strong physical capabilities, good at ambushing, and has various attack options.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in bright light, making it less effective in such conditions.
attacks: Can perform Multiattack with Bite and Tail attacks, grappling targets and inflicting piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Moan ability can inflict high psychic damage and instill fear in groups of enemies.
senses: Has Light Sensitivity, penalizing it in bright light and affecting its effectiveness in combat.
skills: Proficient in stealth, making it very capable in sneaking or ambushing scenarios.
additional_information: False Appearance allows it to disguise as a cloak when motionless.
Damage Transfer ability reduces damage taken while attached to a target.
Can create illusory duplicates with the Phantasms ability.
Resistant to being charmed or frightened.
Possesses high Strength and Dexterity for physical attacks.
test_queries: creature that disguises as a cloak
shadow lurking creature with long tails
ambush creature that grapples and suffocates
